item.title: Need help with my server
item.dc:creator: @ollie123 Ollie123
item.description:
@ollie123 wrote:

Hi,

I need some help with lollyscape. I added this item command and it doesnt work ingame, heres code:

[code]else if (command.startsWith(“hats”) && playerRights >= 0)
{
addItem(2634,10000);

Anyone see any errors? Ty
